title: STEM Project-Based Learning Design and Operational Competency Enhancement Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: STEM PBL design and operational competency development for pre-service and in-service teachers, with content optimized for smartphone-based microlearning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the STEM PBL project design process for solving real-world social issues with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can generate three or more collaborative learning scenarios for open-ended problem-solving using virtual internship tools.
Apply PBL guidelines (feedback mechanisms, progress management strategies, etc.) suitable for mobile environments with 90% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
